title: RUN Root Cause Analysis Worker
description: Runpod Serverless handler for the RUN neural Granger causal discovery pipeline.

input.name: Root Path
input.description: Base directory containing dataset files and configuration.

input.name: Data Path
input.description: Relative path to the CSV file to analyse.

input.name: Root Cause Service
input.description: Service column to evaluate as the hypothesised root cause.

input.name: Trigger Point
input.description: Downstream service column used as the trigger point.

input.name: Device
input.description: Torch device string such as cuda:0 or cpu.

input.name: Epochs
input.description: Number of training epochs to run.

input.name: Optimizer
input.description: Optimizer to use during training (Adam, SGD, etc.).

input.name: Data Loader Workers
input.description: Number of worker processes to use for loading data.
